meanings.definition: A device or compartment used for freezing food or keeping it frozen.
meanings.sent1: My mom stores ice cream in the freezers at the store.
meanings.sent2: The freezers at the grocery store are always cold.
meanings.sent3: The freezers in the kitchen hum softly as they work their magic.
meanings.sent4: The freezers in the supermarket are like icy treasure chests.
meanings.sent5: The freezers in the restaurant keep the ingredients fresh and ready to use.

meanings.sent1: The kitchen had two freezers to store all the frozen food.
meanings.sent2: The freezers in the garage were filled with frozen vegetables.
meanings.sent3: The freezers in the house were always full of tasty treats.
meanings.sent4: The freezers in the basement were like frozen treasure troves.
meanings.sent5: The freezers in the pantry kept everything nice and cold.
